attributes.action: Establish a COVID-19 Memorial Day annually from 23rd March 2021.
attributes.additional_details: The UK has suffered massive tragic loss during the pandemic, moreover, their families have been unable to process their loss traditionally, the effort of key workers could also be acknowledged, and the population as a whole will have the opportunity to unify to express shared grief
attributes.background: Create an annual public holiday to commemorate the loss, suffering, and effort associated with the COVID-19 pandemic.
